Posts.Content: Hello, I am on my third fect cycle and am experiencing excruciating stomach pains. Has anybody else had this and what did you do? Thanks pretty in pink.
Posts.Title: Pain in stomach during chemo

Posts.Content: Thanks i think you may be right,also there have been many times i have read your posts so informative and helpful.PIP
Posts.Title: Pain in stomach during chemo

Posts.Content: Thanks i think it is constipation,Horrible! PIP
Posts.Title: Pain in stomach during chemo

Posts.Content: I am to start radiotherapy in a few weeks. Has anybody got some tips to help. I know that  a lot of people feel  exhausted after the course (mine three weeks) I had problems with Chemo and infection after mx and recon. I hope this will be trouble free!! My only worry is that I am still tired from surgery 7 weeks ago!! Is that normal? Used back musle.  Thanks x
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy.

Posts.Content: Same as me apart from the fact I Had mastectomy/reconstruction and all the lymph nodes removed. Message me if you would like  some support. I would rather do it in private!! X
Posts.Title: Feeling sad and alone :(

Posts.Content: Hi again, are you very slim!! . When do you see your breast surgeon again. You need to tell him your concerns. He will advise what can be done. Or ring your bcn up if anxious. Where are you?. I assume they would fill the area up with your own fat? Or you may have to live with this. My boob still feels very foreign to me still. Xxx
Posts.Title: Following Mastectomy and Reconstruction

Posts.Content: Hi, I am nine weeks post op the same as you. Please do not worry what you are feeling is normal.very early days for you. Even now i get  exhausted and feel uncomfortable. I was in hospital with an infection in my new boob and that knocked me for six. My wound is still getting dressed weekly. Also a couple of seromas too!! It's a big op. My surgeon said when we do the nipple and other breast (uplift)  he could do lippo suction on my  other side  so it would match the less fatty operated side up. Please feel free to ask me anything if you think I could help. Big hug xx
Posts.Title: Following Mastectomy and Reconstruction

Posts.Content: Hi, This is very hard for someone to answer!! It really is your personal choice who you tell. If i wanted to let someone know I would say. "I could be better my Cancer has returned " I hope you find your answer in due course. Good Luck with  your treatment.
Posts.Title: What do i say? Odd question i know....

Posts.Content: How long do you need to do your exercises  post op? Thanks
Posts.Title: Exercises for arm after reconstruction

Posts.Content: Kipper, how I agree with you "the whole strong thing"  annoys me too.. I had a few weeks to decide what I would do re loosing a breast. I had chemo first in hope to save the breast. The nhs have a great video which explains the options you have.Ask your BCN for it. Sometimes like me you cant have what you want! Your surgeon should explain what is suitable. I have found it hard to adjust to my faux boob I call it! I had recon straight away using back muscle. Looks good but find the tightness under my arm where the muscle and blood supply pulled through a strange feeling. 10 weeks post op. I feel guilty for wanting to turn back the clock.In my head I know I should be fortunate to be alive.  Good luck with what you decide. J .
